title: Role of moss in primary succession - diagram

content.question: Which of the following best describes the role of moss in the transition to stage <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>III</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of the process?

choices.label: It serves as a soil seed bank in the leaf litter.
It breaks down rock and adds organic nutrients to the soil.
It provides shade and reduces surface temperatures.
It provides habitat for birds and mammals.

content.answer: It breaks down rock and adds organic nutrients to the soil.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
